clauses.title: Termination
clauses.summary: 90 days notice period required for contract termination.

clauses.title: Liability Cap
clauses.summary: Total liability limited to 12 months' fees.

clauses.title: Data Privacy
clauses.summary: GDPR compliance requirements and data handling procedures.

insights.message: Liability cap excludes data breach costs which could result in unlimited exposure.
Auto-renewal clause activates unless cancelled 60 days before expiry.
Force majeure clause provides adequate protection for unforeseen circumstances.

evidence.snippet: Total liability shall be limited to the aggregate fees paid by Customer in the twelve (12) months preceding the claim.
Either party may terminate this Agreement by providing ninety (90) days written notice.
This Agreement shall automatically renew for successive one-year terms unless terminated.

clauses.title: Service Credits
clauses.summary: Monthly credits for downtime exceeding SLA thresholds.

clauses.title: Bandwidth Allocation
clauses.summary: Guaranteed minimum bandwidth with burst capacity.

clauses.title: Security Requirements
clauses.summary: End-to-end encryption and security monitoring obligations.

insights.message: No liability cap specified for security breaches or data loss incidents.
Termination requires 180 days notice which limits flexibility.
Price increases allowed with only 30 days notice.

evidence.snippet: Provider shall maintain minimum bandwidth of 100 Mbps with burst capacity up to 1 Gbps.
Either party may terminate with one hundred eighty (180) days written notice.
Service credits equal to pro-rated monthly fees for each hour of downtime.
